title: Resources
cleaned_text: The resources on this page relate to our mission, we want to increase the accessibility of Cochrane evidence to the global nursing community. We want to help other nurses become users of Cochrane evidence in their professional education, training, research, management, clinical practice and continuing education. The resources provided on this page are open access, please reference the CNCF when you use these materials in teaching and education or professional development, research or publication.
